mapper.insert: insert into jpush_alert (name, push_type, push_districts, push_source, push_user_type, status, content, jump_to, jump_to_link,expect_push_time,created_time,created_by,updated_time,updated_by,is_automatic,message_id) value(#{name}, #{pushType}, #{pushDistricts,typeHandler=com.tuotiansudai.util.mybatis.StringListHandler}, #{pushSource}, #{pushUserType,typeHandler=com.tuotiansudai.jpush.util.mybatis.PushUserTypeHandler}, #{status}, #{content}, #{jumpTo}, #{jumpToLink}, #{expectPushTime}, #{createdTime}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedTime}, #{updatedBy},#{isAutomatic}, #{messageId})
mapper.select: select SUBSTRING_INDEX(name, '-', -1) from jpush_alert where push_type = #{pushType} and is_automatic = false ORDER BY ID DESC limit 1;
select * from jpush_alert where push_type = #{pushType} and status = 'ENABLED' and is_automatic = true
